title: Client crashing every game
body: Every time I load into a game, i get the message "leagueoflegends.exe", and my game crashes. I've been getting back into games before the 2 minute mark,  so im not getting leaverbuster. any help would be great!

replies.body: Are you receiving a bugsplat error?  Your game might be failing to render properly, which can be caused by game file or driver problems.  I suggest using our [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help get this fixed up.  If you still have any issues, give me some more details on what's happening, and I'll do what I can!

yep this is happening to a lot of the player base referring to my board will have a few options with solutions hope they help! http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/hOPA8Vo8-game-crashes-when-load-into-a-game
